Articles.Content: So I saw this from reddit, and idk which realism mod forum to post it in so I just put it here. Idk if it would add much since from my understanding u experience the boom only if youre not the craft thats going supersonic and I rarely fly another craft when I'm going supersonic for obvious reasons but it would be cool for those using multiplayer mods and those that do fighter jet showdowns.

The problem I have with this is that one does not hear the boom in the craft that is making it. 

https://www.nasa.gov/connect/chat/sonic_boom_chat.html

Might be useful for those making cinematics with fixed camera positions, but for me as a regular player, it would be immersion breaking to a point.   Not that there aren't gloriously glaring reality issues with the rest of the game.
